replies.author: fooker

timeline.message:
NMS-12552: Add unknown variants for BMP and BGP

BGP packet parsing now may not return a packet if the packet type does
not match the expected one. Parsing still can contine even if a packet
is unknown.

NMS-12552: Add unknown variants for BMP and BGP

BGP packet parsing now may not return a packet if the packet type does
not match the expected one. Parsing still can contine even if a packet
is unknown.
